name: Paino
description:
Paino is an arcade platformer inspired by Donkey Kong where you try to get the best score possible by killing enemies and getting high combos.

You take control of a strange figure and throw a ball that has been tied to you. You need to think carefully when to throw it to maximize your score.

My thouhghts:

The main idea of the game is pretty good in my opinion but because I didn't have enough time there are some cheesy strategies you can easily exploit and if you don't, the game is way too hard.

The art in the game isn't that good but does its job. Same goes for the sounds. Would have been nice to add some music but didn't have enough time for that.

Overall I am pretty happy with how my game turned out especially considering I didn't have even the 48 hours to make the game because I had other things to do.
